channel.title: Tests on PHI 152
channel.description: Recent content in Tests on PHI 152

item.title: Test 2 Information
item.description: Our second test, on Wednesday May 19, will be released at the beginning of the test period (8:00 AM) through a Blackboard announcement (which will also automatically go, more or less immediately, to your email). The test is designed to take one hour. The test will be due by upload at the end of the session (10:00 AM), except for those students who have arranged additional time as allowed by Student Access Services.

item.title: Test 1 Questions
item.description: This test is designed to take one hour. You may complete it during the class session, or you may submit it later in the day. Tests submitted any time on March 24 will be on time. Submit through the upload link at the course Blackboard site > Tests > Test 1. Instructions Choose five (5) of the questions below under “Questions” to work on. For each of those five questions, write a one-paragraph answer, not shorter than five sentences.

item.title: Test 1 Information
item.description: Our first test, on Wednesday March 24, will be released at the beginning of the class session (9:40 AM) through a Blackboard announcement (which will automatically also go, at least fairly promptly, to your email). The test is designed to take one hour. You may complete it during the class session, or you may submit it later in the day. Tests submitted any time on March 24 will be on time.
